member.summary: Gets or sets the expression that will be used as a base for a Regex that will match properties based on the .
member.example: If you want to match only the property "Width" - use the expression "^\b(Width)\b$", without the quotes. If you want to match the "Width", "MinWidth" and "MaxWidth" - use the expression "Width", without the quotes.
